Terms & Policies (The LONG Version) NOTE:After reviewing the product listing description and photos, please read the terms and policies below to make an informed decision, because your satisfaction is our #1 goal. Thank you! ITEM QUANTITY: - The item you were looking at is available at the time the listing was posted. - We do our best to keep track of the quantity the fulfillment center has. - In the rare and unlikely event the item is not available, we will first check other fulfillment centers. - If an item is no longer available for reasons out of our control, we will refund 100% of your money immediately with our sincerest apologies. PAYMENT & SALES TAX: - We accept Paypal with verified address. - Sales tax is only charged for sales in WA. HANDLING & PROCESSING: - 5 business days (excluding weekends & nationally observed holidays) depending on how large the item is and where it is coming from. SHIPPING: - All new items we source are shipped directly from our fulfillment centers (located in multiple states) to your home in the continental US (48 contiguous states). - Large, bulky items require several extra days for processing and shipping due to their size and shape. - We may need to contact you to make shipping arrangements if freight is required to ensure you or another adult 18+ you trust will be home to accept the delivery when it arrives. A signature may be required. - We don't ship to Alaska, Hawaii, PO boxes, APO, FPO, DPO, US territories, or internationally at this time. - Combined shipping and local pick up are not available. - Your tracking number will be dispensed once we receive it from the fulfillment center. THE CHRISTMAS HOLIDAY: - The holidays, especially Christmas, are busy times for us. Please plan ahead and purchase your gift by the cutoff time which is 5 pm December 5th. Free standard shipping will get the item to you or the recipient before Christmas unless it's a large, bulky item. Keep in mind, however, that weather conditions and carrier delays are out of our control. GUARANTEE:- We offer a 14 day guarantee on most new items unless specifically noted. - If there is a problem or you aren't satisfied during that time frame, please give us a fair chance by contacting us first through the "Contact Seller" link so that we can work with you to find a solution. - If a solution is not available, you will receive a refund less shipping fees once the fulfillment center receives your item (this may take a few weeks depending on how long it takes for the shipment to arrive). FEEDBACK:- We appreciate you taking the time to give us feedback when you are satisfied with the transaction. - You will receive positive feedback from us in return.
